tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: CARING  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Taking for him calc 2 right now and all of the previous courses, the man is a fantastic professor, sometimes it seems like he\'s getting ahead of the material but you will see it becomes important later. People complaining about him are simply bad students. If you try and work hard it will pay off with him. Can\'t give enough praise.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I am currently enrolled with him but have tooken my lower math classes with him too. Ask question, participate and learn his shortcuts for they are useful in the long run. And in class too. Very serious self conserved repected man. Ive passed his other 2 classes with an A and a C. Since math is not getting any easier I understand.

stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  TOUGH GRADER  TEST HEAVY
comments: Winter \'16, difficult class. His teaching methods were different, teaches you shortcuts... in the end turned out to be beneficial. Tough grader, no half credit on exams, most half credit he\'ll give you is for 2 q\'s... students didnt ask questions, he would put them on the spot, he eventually eases up as long as he see\'s u trying & asking q\'s.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This is a great prof if you are good at teaching yourself from the textbook. The testHW do not count instead he uses them to gauge how the class is doing. During class he encourages questions. He tends to teach shortcuts which makes the class confusing. Most of us are there not knowing the basic formula for solving equations. Also he is moody.

comments: Great Professor. He may seem difficult at first but he will answer as many questions students have. He really wants the students to learn the information. Definitley would recomend taking his class.

comments: Not the easiest subject. He grades pretty easily and does not fail students. he has his own (curved) grading scale. I will admit it is really difficult to hear him, especially when the ac is on haha. However, he is a very nice man and extremely patient!!

comments: Is knowledgeable in his field but has no social skills. Does not follow Syllabus and retracts his preious statements.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He\'s EXTREMELY helpful, and you can tell he genuinely wants his students to understand the material. He explains the reasoning behind equations, rather than encouraging you to just memorize them. It makes the class so much easier. I\'m definitely taking him for my future math classes!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He is a really great professor. Focuses on teaching for learning, not to see you fail. He wants you to succeed and really makes it possible. I didn\'t like math before taking him, and now, I don\'t think it is too bad. Take him if learning and getting a good grade matter to you. If you do the work, and try, he\'ll help you get where you need to be.

comments: he knows how to teach..take him!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This instructor is excellent. He knows what he is talking about and explains things very clearly. In addition, the textbook is well written so the lecture and text supplement each other very well. As long as you do all the homework, the tests are fairly easy. The instructor is very approachable and willing to stay after class to further help.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This professor is kind of funny sometimes. I liked his class because it was easy and gives you that awe moment when you learn a new trick at calculating something without the calculator. I took calculus, participated in class, and did all my he. I\'m sure if you study and understand him, you would enjoy his class. :)

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: At first, I had a hard time trying to understand him but as the semester went by, I got used to it. He is willing to stay after class to clarify any questions or doubts. He likes classroom participation. He is a really good teacher and knows what he is teaching. Definitely take him!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: At first, he seems very strict and unapporachable. As the semester goes, he becomes more friendly and definitely helpful. There\'s a bit of a language and tone issue, but he is willing to explain anything until everyone gets it. He teaches you tricks, which may either help or confuse. Participate a lot. Tests are average in difficulty.
